name: Schelmish
description: '''Schelmish''' was a German [[Medieval metal|Mittelalter rock]] band from the city of [[Bonn]]. The band originally formed in 1999 for a birthday celebration for band member Des Demonia's mother. The language of their songs varies between German, English, Latin, French and several old languages. The band split-up in December 2012; a group of member founded the electro folk rock band [[InVictus]].
